name: CUBEZ (itch) (StarBoyWarrior)
description:
CUBEZ is a first-person shooter game with a twist - you shoot cubes instead of people.

With MANY more updates to come, this is only a demo version with one map.  

So far, the main goal is to survive for as long as possible. 

Steps for download:

1. Download the files

2. Drag it onto your desktop

3. Extract the files

4. Open the folder and run the .exe to play

Sadly, so far the game is only available on Windows x64 bit.
